landing.description: Connect your controller to your PC or tablet and press any button. You will be automatically taken to the checker screen.

checker.title: Controller Input Checker
checker.connectPrompt: Please connect a controller. After pairing with your PC/device, press any button to begin.
checker.sidewaysNote: Note: When using a Joy-Con sideways, the stick-press button may not be detected due to OS or browser limitations. This is not a controller defect.

windows.title: Connecting on Windows
windows.step3: 3. Press and hold the sync button on your controller to enter pairing mode.
windows.step4: 4. When "Pro Controller" or "Joy-Con" appears in the device list, select it to pair.

ipad.title: Connecting on iPad
ipad.step2: 2. Make sure Bluetooth is turned on.
ipad.step3: 3. Press and hold the sync button on your controller to enter pairing mode.
ipad.step4: 4. When the controller name appears in the "Other Devices" list, tap it to pair.

mac.title: Connecting on Mac
mac.step2: 2. Make sure Bluetooth is turned on.
mac.step3: 3. Press and hold the sync button on your controller to enter pairing mode.
mac.step4: 4. When the controller appears in the device list, click the "Connect" button.

guide.unknown: Please pair from your OS's Bluetooth settings.
